meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! It's your favorite grog reviewer back at it again with another thrilling review!

Alright, let's get this Watch Dogs party started! I'm not gonna lie, when I first booted up this game, I was a bit skeptical. I mean, an open-world action-adventure game about hacking? Sounds like a recipe for disaster, right? But boy, was I pleasantly surprised!

As IGN so eloquently put it, "Car chases aside, Watch Dogs is fundamentally very well made, and has more than enough unique ideas to make it a great and memorable open-world action game." And I gotta agree! The main man (or should I say, main hack?) is the hacking abilities. It's like nothing I've ever seen before - all this tech-savvy wizardry at your fingertips!

But let's not get ahead of ourselves. The real magic happens when you're cruising through Chicago in a sleek black sedan, blowing away bad guys left and right. I mean, what's not to love about that?! And don't even get me started on the side quests - they're like little puzzle boxes just waiting to be solved! (Shout-out to GameSpot for calling it "riotous"!)

Now, I know some of you might be thinking, "Uh-oh, another open-world game?" But trust me, this one's got legs. The world Ubisoft created is so vivid and immersive, you'll feel like you're right there in the midst of the Windy City action! And let's not forget the social commentary - it's like they took a big ol' magnifying glass to our surveillance-happy society and said, "Hey, look at this!"

Of course, no review would be complete without giving some love to our fellow critics. I mean, Game Informer nailed it when they said, "The main draw of any open-world game is the gameplay..." Preach! And Vandal got it right too - even though the team could've pushed a bit harder, this game's still a winner!

In conclusion, Watch Dogs is like the ultimate party guest - it's always up for a good time, never gets old, and knows just when to bring the heat! So grab your hacking tools, slip into something comfy, and get ready to join me on this wild ride!

Stay tuned for more grog-tastic reviews, folks!
